name: user-switching
description: Instant switching between user accounts in WordPress.
author: John Blackbourn

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' user-switching.php package.json package-lock.json readme.md
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' user-switching.php package.json package-lock.json readme.md
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' user-switching.php package.json package-lock.json readme.md
